casebody.data:
Genoveva Maria Luisa Ocampo Cataldi LOZA SANTIVANEZ, et al., petitioners,
v.
ESTADO PLURINACIONAL DE BOLIVIA, fka La Republica de Bolivia, et al. No. 12-1434. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Case below, 512 Fed.Appx. 887 .

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
